newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani money market rates slip at close.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani money market rates slip at close.

text.p: Pakistan's money rates fluctuated widely before slipping near close on Thursday as banks were uncertain about the status of liquidity, dealers said.
"The market behaved erratically from the start," a dealer at KASB & Co said, adding that initial overnight deals were seen at 19 percent.
He said the rates fell to as low as 16 percent but soared back to 19.50 percent levels around midday. Closing hours saw overnights crashing down and settlling at 10 percent.
